config.http.entity.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wit="http://www.witsml.org/">
  <soap:Header/>
  <soap:Body>
    <wit:WMLS_GetFromStore>
      <wit:WMLtypeIn>log</wit:WMLtypeIn>
      <wit:QueryIn><![CDATA[
        <logs xmlns="http://www.witsml.org/schemas/1series" version="1.4.1.1">
          <log uidWell="${WELL_UID}" uidWellbore="${WELLBORE_UID}" uid="">
            <nameWell/><nameWellbore/><name/>
            <logCurveInfo>
              <mnemonic>DEPT</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>HKLD</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>WOB</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>TQA</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>RPM</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>FLOW</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>SPP</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>MWEI</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>TEMP</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>GR</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>RES</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>NPHI</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>RHOB</mnemonic>
              <mnemonic>CALI</mnemonic>
            </logCurveInfo>
            <logData>
              <data/>
            </logData>
          </log>
        </logs>
      ]]></wit:QueryIn>
      <wit:OptionsIn>returnElements=all</wit:OptionsIn>
      <wit:CapabilitiesIn/>
    </wit:WMLS_GetFromStore>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>
config.errors.deadletterqueue.topic.name: witsml-dlq
